title: Ford - R & D costs 2013 to 2019
summary: The statistic shows Ford R D R Expenditures billion from the fiscal Year of 2013 to the fiscal Year of 2019 .
Ford R D R Expenditures billion amounted to around 8.2 billion dollars in the fiscal Year of 2015 .

The Ford R D Motor Corporation is a Japan-based multinational automotive company and one of the largest automobile manufacturers in the world and the incumbent leader in terms of global car sales by manufacturer .
